com.hazelcast.jet.function

Interface DistributedLongPredicate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LongPredicate, Serializable
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface DistributedLongPredicate
extends LongPredicate, Serializable
    Serializable variant of java.util.function.LongPredicate which declares checked exception.
